name: Centaur
description: Reclusive wanderers and omen-readers of the wild, centaurs avoid conflict but fight fiercely when pressed. They roam the vast wilderness, keeping far from borders, law and the company of other creatures.
special: Charge. If the cenntaur moves at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage.
